page.title: 06GUEST HOUSES
page.content: THE GABLES-Guesthouse,Cafe and Shop Gables is a pretty busy house in Umberleigh, they have lots of visitors. The owners who run the shop came to Umberleigh a year ago and have worked in the shop since they came. The cafe was rebuilt in 1984. The cafe has never been robbed so far. After school lots of children come to buy sweets. People come to stay from all over the world. The cafe is just by the River Taw which is very pleasant. The owners enjoy living in a cafe. The guest house is open all day but the cafe is open from 10am-6pm. The cafe used to be a post office. There are approx three guest bedrooms with a sink in each and one main bedroom.
